title: Economics of Name, Image and Likeness
itunes:title: Economics of Name, Image and Likeness
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch as they discuss the economics behind Name, Image and Likeness (NIL) and the changing landscape of collegiate athletics with Kurt Rotthoff, a professor of economics and finance at Seton Hall University. All that and more on Business of Sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch as they discuss the economics behind Name, Image and Likeness (NIL) and the changing landscape of collegiate athletics with Kurt Rotthoff, a professor of economics and finance at Seton Hall University. All that and more on Business of Sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
